title: I didnt get any Blue Essence mission
body: My friends got the missions and also got the Blue Essence orb but I didn't get any! I need help my balance now is too low{{champion:32}}

replies.body:
Did you purchase any **Tier 3 runes** or **rune pages** prior to the start of the 2017 season? If you did not, then your IP will just become BE 1-to-1, and you will not have a mission to recover the IP spent on runes (the Blue Essence Orbs mission).

You can read more about the requirements to get rune reimbursement at the [Preseason Update FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ):

>**Q: I bought lots of runes in the old system. Do I get anything for spending on the old runes?**

>**A**:<snip>

>So, for runes you **bought before the beginning of the 2017 season**, we'll give you 100 IP for each regular **tier 3 rune**, and 300 IP for each **tier 3 quint**. For any runes you bought since the beginning of the 2017 season, weâ€™ll refund the full IP cost.

>For rune pages, the plan is for your rune pages to carry over into the new runes system, so prices on rune pages aren't being changed. However we heard from some players that being able to edit rune pages in champ select makes having more than a few pages feel less meaningful. So, for **any rune page you bought with IP**, we'll also give you back 1,500 blue essence.

Hi there Xaeros, earlier this evening I completed my first game on this patch.  I got a couple awesome epic skins, but if I understood correctly it looked like I should have gotten somewhere north of another 30k of BE.  I had 69k before the match and that's still what I have - perhaps I misunderstood the message?  I had around 43 or 44k of IP before the patch as I recall (was off on travel for a bit).

According to Porocles, they were able to check your account and verify that you didn't have any **Tier 3 runes or quints**, or **rune pages** purchased before the cut-off date. So, in this case, you wouldn't have the "Rune Collector" mission that rewards the large amounts of BE.

Sorry for any confusion!

OK thanks, just want to make sure that wasn't the other guy?  i replied to someone else's thread...

I had quite a few tier 3 runes and quints including specialty ones like the faster energy regen ones and it's probably been a couple years since I had to buy any new ones.

Oops! I'm so sorry, I didn't notice that you weren't the original poster!

After completing the "Rune Collector" mission by completing any matchmade game with the new runes system, you should have received some **Blue Essence orbs** in your **Loot** inventory. Just open those up to get the rest of your **BE**! :)

I check this out for you, but it doesn't look like there were any greater runes or pages that were purchased before September 1st.  No missions were created for this account as a result, because there was no content for conversion.
